task_description: Publish test video compilation to TikTok test account

deliverables.description: Published video on TikTok test account
Simple test caption with appropriate tags

quality_criteria: Caption indicates this is a test post
Post URL is captured and stored
Publishing output references knowledge_get guidance on tone and hashtags.
workflow_steps: Call knowledge_get with persona "quinn" and project "test_video_gen" to refresh social publishing best practices before drafting copy.
Create test caption: 'Test video generation - moon/cheeseburger + sun/pickle'
Upload to TikTok test account via upload-post
Verify upload success and capture URL
success_definition: Video published to TikTok test account, URL stored, and run marked complete
